nodes.text: Zeltros sliders were one of the standard sliders on the menu at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. They were inspired by the 'party planet' Zeltros and consisted of Zeltron pop-peppers, pink lettuce, magenta onions, spicy "pleasure planet" sauce and a Mongo Beefhead patty all on a trans-shipped medium-density food-board. They cost 6.7 credits.
